launchpad_s_plus

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • launchpad_s_plus.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to determine input from the Launchpad S
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

      static void clearPressed()
      Clears the status of the key press map.
      static void disableConsoleEcho()
      Turns off displaying of key presses and releases on the console
      static void disableEchoNotesOff()
      Turns off displaying of key receives on console
      static void disableEchoNotesOn()
      Turns off displaying of key presses on console
      static void displayOff()
      Displays every key release on the console if DISPLAYOFF is true
      static void displayOn()
      Displays every key press on the console if DISPLAYON is true
      static void displayStatus()
      Displays the map of the current pressed pads on the console 1 for pressed, 0 for released

      Turns on displaying of key releases on console

      Turns on displaying of key presses on console

    • Method Detail

      • clearPressed

        public static void clearPressed()
        Clears the status of the key press map. Use this if your implementing function uses the isPressed[][] map to determine actions that follow

      • disableConsoleEcho

        public static void disableConsoleEcho()
        Turns off displaying of key presses and releases on the console

      • disableEchoNotesOff

        public static void disableEchoNotesOff()
        Turns off displaying of key receives on console

      • disableEchoNotesOn

        public static void disableEchoNotesOn()
        Turns off displaying of key presses on console

      • displayOff

        public static void displayOff()
        Displays every key release on the console if DISPLAYOFF is true

      • displayOn

        public static void displayOn()
        Displays every key press on the console if DISPLAYON is true

      • displayStatus

        public static void displayStatus()
        Displays the map of the current pressed pads on the console 1 for pressed, 0 for released

      • enableEchoNotesOff

        public static void enableEchoNotesOff()
        Turns on displaying of key releases on console

      • enableEchoNotesOn

        public static void enableEchoNotesOn()
        Turns on displaying of key presses on console

      • getDataReceived

        public static int getDataReceived()
        Returns the amount of bytes received from the Launchpad S during the current session
        Returns:
        Bytes received

      • getNumberOfPadsPressed

        public static int getNumberOfPadsPressed()
        Returns the number of user pad presses during the current session
        Returns:
        Number of pads pressed

      • getPositionX

        public static int getPositionX()
        Returns X position of last input
        Returns:
        int Launchpad X position of the last update received

      • getPositionY

        public static int getPositionY()
        Returns Y position of last input
        Returns:
        int Launchpad Y position of the last update received

      • getStatus

        public static boolean getStatus()
        Returns if the last input received was a key press or release
        Returns:
        boolean Returns True if the last key changed was a press, False if it was released

      • reenableConsoleEcho

        public static void reenableConsoleEcho()
        Resets console output to what it was before disableConsoleEcho() was called

      • setPressed

        public static void setPressed(int i,
                              int j,
                              boolean status)
        Either sets a pad to pressed or not based on the input parameters
        Parameters:
        i - X location of the pad
        j - Y location of the pad
        status - true: Pressed - false: Released

      • setUnpressed

        public static void setUnpressed(int i,
                                int j)
        Sets the pressed flag of a pad to false
        Parameters:
        i - X location of the pad
        j - Y location of the pad

      • updatePadsPressed

        public static void updatePadsPressed()
        Updates pads pressed statistics

      • waitForInput

        public static boolean waitForInput()
        Does nothing until there is a key pressed after the method is called. This is used to hold the thread of the calling method until there is input.

        Generally for use with while(!waitForInput()){ do stuff; } or with waitForInput(); do stuff after;

        Returns true when there is input.
        Returns:
        boolean True when there was an input
